channel.title: Homes on Masaki Iwabuchi
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Masaki Iwabuchi

item.title:
Design Driven.
Speculative Thinking.
item.description: Masaki is a NY-based interaction design technologist with a head for social, environmental, and planetary possibility. üëç

About Me Masaki is an award-winning interaction and service designer experienced in a wide array of projects from tangible products to intangible services. Currently, he is a MFA candidate of the Design + Technology program at Parsons School of Design to explore new design methodologies for social and planetary scale problem-solving such as speculative design and transdisciplinary design beyond user-centered design. Previously he worked at IBM Design and has 10 years of professional UX/UI design experience in the Human Centered Design discipline.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: This is an example of using the custom widget to create your own homepage section.
